alert.note: Alert for Red Willow (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued December 02 at 2:15PM CST until December 02 at 3:45PM CST by NWS Goodland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Goodland has issued a * Dust Storm Warning for... Sheridan County in northwestern Kansas... Decatur County in northwestern Kansas... Red Willow County in southwestern Nebraska... * Until 345 PM CST. * At 214 PM CST, a wall of dust was along a line extending from 4 miles north of McCook to near Herndon to 12 miles southeast of McDonald, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility with damaging wind in excess of 60 mph. SOURCE...Doppler radar. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. Locations impacted include... McCook, Oberlin, Hoxie, Grinnell, Indianola, Bartley and Selden. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Motorists should not drive into a dust storm. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!
